statements: UPDATE battery_metrics SET voltage = 12.34, temperature = 25.50 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Battery_Performance_Metrics SET charging_time = '2 hours', discharging_time = '1.5 hours', charging_efficiency = 0.95 WHERE battery_id = '0eab83ff-3bb6-4f3e-a2da-845ccd48a820';
UPDATE Electric_Vehicle_Batteries SET capacity = 75.25, cycle_life = 1500 WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';

UPDATE BatteryHealth SET health_status = 'Good', temperature = 25 WHERE cycles_completed > 100;
